story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0100_1:
Hahaha!
This town belongs to us now!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0200_1:
Ma’am! These are those brats that we were
telling you about!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0101_0400_1:
Very well, I shall purloin your Pokémon as well,
and they will join my pretties!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0501_0100_1:
Ma’am, you lied about how strong you are!
Wait...why did I agree to be your servant?
story_zako_battle_09_01/3701_0501_0200_1:
We got tricked by her boss-like vibes!
I mean, if you really think about it,
who even says “my pretties” anymore?
story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0100_1:
Argh! I went through all the trouble o’ stealin’
this little guy, and now...
story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
It’s too darn cute... I can’t use it for battling!
I...I can’t do it.
story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0300_1:
Hey! Your Pokémon look pretty strong!
Lemme just take ’em off your hands for ya!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0101_0400_1:
Wait! Stay back, lil’ bud!
I can’t have you getting hurt!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3801_0501_0200_1:
I guess it was pretty stupid of me to steal other
people’s Pokémon... I’ll go give this little guy
back to his Trainer now.
story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0100_1: Hnnnggg! I can’t take it off!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0200_1:
I didn’t want to put this mask on!
Why would anybody put glue on the inside?!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0300_1: Oof, you look like you’re in a bind.
story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0101_0400_1: Hm? What’s this? My body is acting on its own!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0501_0100_1: I did it! I got it off! I’m free!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3802_0501_0200_1:
Hmm... I feel like you lost your single
defining characteristic.
story_zako_battle_09_01/3703_0101_0600_1:
Ooh! What nice-looking sync pairs!
I’ll beat you and take your Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0100_1:
Pokémon Ranger en route!
Wee woo wee woo!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0200_1:
Ambush successful!
You must be members of Team Break!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0101_0300_1:
Now, send out your Pokémon!
We’ll be having a Pokémon battle now!
story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0501_0100_1:
Training is complete!
How was that? Realistic, huh?
story_zako_battle_09_01/3803_0501_0200_1:
That was a good workout before fighting
Team Break!
